mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}
